title: Gilded Rose
description: Can I win her heart without destroying my company’s plans?A chance encounter after a crappy day leaves me reeling. She’s everything I didn’t know I wanted.But when she tells me the trouble she’s having at work, I vow to help her. Never realizing my family and my company are behind it all.Will my years of experience help me navigate this rocky path or am I doomed to be without love forever?Gilded Rose is part of the Golden Era series of later in life romances and is the second story in the More Family Dynasty where the men and women know who they want and aren’t afraid to go after it.
author: T.B. Mann
